transcription: Tell me what? Yeah!  That's just plain guys, that's just plain guys. That's just plain guys. Daredevil. How is it? What are you doing in my swamp?  Fuck! Fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck! I forgot.  I forgot, I forgot. Your beer just made me have a... blue moon! Blue moon! He kept the picture on his wall. I forgot.  I said blue moon of Kentucky just keep on shining Shine on the one that's gone and left me blue I said blue moon of Kentucky just keep on shining Shine on the one that's gone and left me blue Well it was on one moonlit night Stars shining bright Whispering hi and lo  I said, Blue Moon!
